name: reactor
description: Base Node web service with React + Redux

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.test:client: BABEL_ENV=test TEST_ENV=client MOCHA_FILE=./test/results/test-results.client.xml ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover --dir=./test/coverage/client -x=*.spec.js --report=cobertura --report=lcov ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --compilers js:babel-core/register --reporter mocha-multi --reporter-options spec=-,mocha-junit-reporter=- ./test/jsdom.conf.js ./test/istanbul.conf.js ./test/mocha.conf.js "./client/**/*.spec.js"
scripts.test:server: CONFIG=dev BABEL_ENV=test TEST_ENV=server MOCHA_FILE=./test/results/test-results.server.xml ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover --dir=./test/coverage/server -x=*.spec.js --report=cobertura --report=lcov ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --compilers js:babel-core/register --reporter mocha-multi --reporter-options spec=-,mocha-junit-reporter=- ./test/conf.js ./test/istanbul.conf.js ./test/mocha.conf.js "./controllers/**/*.spec.js" "./lib/**/*.spec.js"
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:dev && npm run build:dist && npm run copy
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server

author: C
